title: Mastering the Art of Non-Verbal Hypnosis: Induce Deep trance Instantly in 3 subjects at a time/ Hana
description:
Hana is one of Dr. Marco Paret's most successful students. In this video, she is on Dr. Paret masterclass and does non-verbal hypnosis exercises with the students. She hypnotized three subjects using Fascination - the power of the gaze and induced deep trances instantly. Waking up, the subjects felt transformed. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
